name: Rōshigumi (Coding-ape)
description:
An action platformer game. Support 2 Player

You can play with Xbox or Playstation Controller or others

!! For Co-op game, you have shared Life Points !!

Controls:

Player 1,Player 2

Movement:

W,Up Arrow

S, Down Arrow

A,Left Arrow

D,Right Arrow

Attack:

J,NumPad 5

Jump + Down for Stomp Attack
